channel.title: Run.bat
channel.description:
i keep getting this error:
Exception in thread "Thread-0" java.lang.OutofMemoryError: java heap space
and have posted multiple times trying to fix it or have help on fixing it...
could someone that doesnt have this error and that has an awsome server that runs perfectly fine plz copy and paste what their run.bat looks like so i could plz fix the problem!?!
and please dont tell me to add this or that here or there, its not hard for someone that doesnt have this problem to just copy and paste their run.bat

item.title: Run.bat

for some reson the window just blinks away for some reson can some one tel y

item.title: Run.bat
item.dc:creator: @flamed_fury1 flamed fury1
item.description:
@flamed_fury1 wrote:

@echo off title FuryScape [RUNSERVER] java -Xmx1024m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.17-ga-bin.jar server

Hope that helps.

Read full topic

item.title: Run.bat
item.dc:creator: @defyboy defyboy
item.description:
@defyboy wrote:

This happens because the server is consuming more memory than the virtual machine can offer it.

Instead of setting your memory higher, Why not actually fix the memory leak?.

People should start structuring their servers rather than dumping everything in client.java

Read full topic

item.title: Run.bat
item.dc:creator: @krawks12 krawks12
item.description:
@krawks12 wrote:

so do i its so gay i usually have like 30 people on but ever since ive added tons of stuff that happens and my rune bat looks like this:

@echo off
java -cp .;./jython.jar server
java -Xmx5000m client

having it say that doesnt do jack shit!

Read full topic
